content: Does anyone have experience creating IGs that are compliant with jurisdictional requirements for accessibility? For example, so that screen readers can correctly navigate the IG, or there is sufficient colour contrast? @Brett Marquard , @Eric Haas, @Jose Costa Teixeira?
it's on the to do list. Probably better discussed in the #ig publishing requirements channel
sadly I have no experience with that

Grahame Grieve said:

it's on the to do list. Probably better discussed in the #ig publishing requirements channel

Please continue on ADA/Screen-reader compliant IGs.
I used an app that scored the contrast once. But it was a while back and I forget the details.
